title: Card Reading
description: At the beginning of all future floors, two portals will appear, that can take you to either the Boss room (Red portal), Item room (Yellow portal) or Secret room (Blue portal)
After Chapter 3 (The Depths floors) only one portal will spawn
Portals disappear if you leave the starting room
Counts as 1 of 3 astrology items needed in the same run to unlock Planetariums
